text: Beyond Paradise is a British crime drama television series that first aired on 24 February 2023. It is a spin-off of the long-running crime series and stars Kris Marshall and Sally Bretton. == Series overview == == Cast == === Main characters === * Kris Marshall as DI Humphrey Goodman * Sally Bretton as Martha Lloyd, Humphrey’s fiancée * Zahra Ahmadi as DS Esther Williams * Dylan Llewellyn as PC Kelby Hartford * Felicity Montagu as Margo Martins, office support * Barbara Flynn as Anne Lloyd, Martha's mother === Recurring characters === * Jamie Bamber as Archie Hughes, Martha's business partner and ex-fiancée (series 1) * Melina Sinadinou as Zoe, Esther's daughter * Chris Jenks as Josh Woods, petty thief * Eva Feiler as Lucy, Josh Woods' fiancée * Jade Harrison as Chief Superintendent Charlotte (Charlie) Woods === Crossover characters from Death in Paradise === * Don Warrington as Commissioner Selwyn Patterson * Élizabeth Bourgine as Catherine Bordey * Ralf Little as DI Neville Parker * Shantol Jackson as DS Naomi Thomas * Tahj Miles as Officer Marlon Pryce Category:British crime drama television series
title: Beyond Paradise (TV series)
